name: outbound-rules
description: Protect against XSS by restricting access to outbound resources if a page defines a rule list

scripts.rollup: npm run compile && rollup build/js/background.js > build/background.js
scripts.build: npm run rollup && mkdir -p plugin && cp build/background.js manifest.json logo.png LICENSE AUTHORS README.md plugin/
scripts.release: ver=$(jq -r .version < manifest.json) && npm run build && (cd plugin/ ; zip -r ../outbound-rules-$ver.xpi .)
